description.value:
Trigger varies

You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wild Shape]{Wild Shape} to transform into one form granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your form's resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.

Trigger You fall 10 feet or more

Effect Choose a form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Aerial Form]{Aerial Form}.

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Form]{Dragon Form} that resists the triggering damage.

Trigger You take fire damage

Effect Choose a fire elemental form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Elemental Form]{Elemental Form}.

Trigger You take poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Plant Form]{Plant Form}.

value.value: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
